free_text.Learning outcomes: The student will learn state-of-the-art algorithms for solving ordinary differential equations, nonlinear systems, and optimization problems. Moreover, the analysis of these algorithms and their efficient implementation will be discussed in some detail.
free_text.Content: [b]Numerical Solution of Ordinary Differential Equations[/b][br/]Runge-Kutta methods. Stability concepts. Multistep methods. Step size control.[br/][br/][b]Nonlinear systems of equations[/b][br/]Solution of large-scale linear and nonlinear systems.[br/][br/][b]Numerical Optimization[/b][br/]Newton, BFGS and conjugate gradient methods. Constrained optimization problems. Quadratic programming.[br/]
free_text.Type of teaching: Ex cathedra, exercises in the class room and with computer

Choix du pas de temps.[br/][br/][b]Systèmes d'équations non linéaires[/b][br/]Techniques de résolution de systèmes (non) linéaires de grande taille.[br/][br/][b]Optimisation numérique[/b][br/]Méthodes de Newton, quasi-Newton, BFGS et du gradient conjugué.
